title: Judge Rules Impeachment Inquiry Is Valid
itunes:title: Judge Rules Impeachment Inquiry Is Valid
description:
Stephen Vladeck, a professor at the University of Texas Law School, discusses Washington Chief U.S. District Judge Beryl Howell’s ruling that the House impeachment inquiry is valid and ordering the U.S. Justice Department to turn over grand-jury materials from Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s report to Congress. He speaks to Bloomberg’s June Grasso.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
